mapper.select: select str1.*,sst1.* from (select * from sc_transaction_record str where str.USER_FK = #{USER_WX}) as str1 left join (select ssi.SHOP_ID,ssi.SHOP_NAME,sst.SERVICE_TYPE from sc_shop_info ssi inner join sc_service_type sst on ssi.SERVICETYPE_FK = sst.SERVICE_PK) sst1 on str1.SHOP_FK = sst1.SHOP_ID;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SC_TRANSACTION_RECORD ( TRADE_PK, USER_FK, SHOP_FK, TRADE_TIME, TRADE_MONEY, TRADE_TYPE, SHOP_PURCHASE_FK, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{UUID}, #{USER_ID}, #{SHOP_ID}, NOW(), #{TRADE_MONEY}, #{TRADE_TYPE}, #{SHOP_PURCHASE_ID}, #{CREATE_BY}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT trs.CREATE_TIME,trs.TRADE_MONEY, trs.TRADE_TYPE, trs.TRANSACTION_MONEY,trs.SHOP_NAME,trs.SERVICE_TYPE,un.USER_NAME FROM ( SELECT trrrr.SHOP_FK, trrrr.CREATE_TIME, trrrr.TRADE_MONEY, trrrr.TRADE_TYPE, trrrr.TRANSACTION_MONEY, trrrr.SHOP_NAME, st.SERVICE_TYPE FROM ( SELECT trrr.*, si.SHOP_NAME, si.SERVICETYPE_FK FROM ( SELECT trr.SHOP_FK, trr.CREATE_TIME, trr.TRADE_MONEY, trr.TRADE_TYPE, spr.TRANSACTION_MONEY FROM ( SELECT tr.SHOP_FK, tr.CREATE_TIME, tr.TRADE_MONEY, tr.TRADE_TYPE, tr.SHOP_PURCHASE_FK FROM sc_transaction_record tr WHERE tr.USER_FK = #{USER_ID} AND tr.TRADE_TYPE like "1_") as trr LEFT JOIN sc_shop_purchase_record as spr ON trr.SHOP_PURCHASE_FK = spr.TRANSACTION_PK) as trrr LEFT JOIN sc_shop_info AS si ON trrr.SHOP_FK = si.SHOP_ID) AS trrrr LEFT JOIN sc_service_type AS st on trrrr.SERVICETYPE_FK = st.SERVICE_PK) AS trs LEFT JOIN ( SELECT u.USER_NAME,usursr.FK_SHOP FROM ( select usur.FK_USER,usur.FK_SHOP FROM (SELECT us.FK_USER, FK_ROLE,FK_SHOP FROM sc_user_shop AS us INNER JOIN sc_user_role AS ur ON us.FK_USER = ur.FK_USER ) as usur INNER JOIN ( SELECT ROLE_PK FROM sc_sys_role WHERE ROLE_NAME="店长") as sr on sr.ROLE_PK = usur.FK_ROLE ) AS usursr INNER JOIN SC_USER AS u ON u.USER_PK = usursr.FK_USER) as un ON un.FK_SHOP = trs.SHOP_FK;
